name: Desk Push-ups
instructions:
1. Place hands shoulder-width on desk edge
2. Walk feet back until body is at 45-degree angle
3. Lower chest to desk, keeping body straight
4. Push back up
5. Repeat 10-15 times
benefits: Builds upper body strength without getting on the floor

name: Chair Squats
instructions:
1. Stand in front of your chair
2. Lower down as if sitting, barely touching the seat
3. Stand back up immediately
4. Repeat 15-20 times

name: Standing Calf Raises
instructions:
1. Stand behind your chair, holding it for balance
2. Rise up onto your toes
3. Hold for 2 seconds
4. Lower back down
5. Repeat 20-25 times

name: Wall Sits
instructions:
1. Stand with back against wall
2. Slide down until thighs are parallel to ground
3. Hold position for 30-45 seconds
4. Stand back up

name: Desk Dips
instructions:
1. Sit on desk edge, hands gripping edge beside hips
2. Slide forward off desk, supporting weight with arms
3. Bend elbows to lower body
4. Push back up
5. Repeat 10-12 times
benefits: Tones arms without leaving your desk area

name: Standing Marches
instructions:
1. Stand tall
2. Lift right knee to hip height
3. Lower and repeat with left
4. Continue alternating for 60 seconds
5. Keep core engaged

name: Shoulder Rolls & Stretches
instructions:
1. Roll shoulders backward 10 times
2. Roll shoulders forward 10 times
3. Reach right arm across body, hold 15 seconds
4. Repeat with left arm
5. Interlace fingers behind back, lift arms
benefits: Relieves desk tension and improves posture

name: Standing Side Bends
instructions:
1. Stand with feet hip-width apart
2. Raise right arm overhead
3. Bend to the left, feeling stretch in right side
4. Hold 5 seconds, return to center
5. Repeat 8 times each side
benefits: Stretches sides, reduces lower back tension

name: Desk Plank Hold
instructions:
1. Place forearms on desk
2. Walk feet back until body is straight
3. Hold position for 30-40 seconds
4. Keep core tight, don't let hips sag

name: Seated Torso Twists
instructions:
1. Sit tall in chair, feet flat
2. Place hands behind head
3. Twist torso to right, hold 3 seconds
4. Return to center
5. Repeat on left
6. Do 10 each side

name: Wall Push-ups
instructions:
1. Stand arm's length from wall
2. Place palms on wall at shoulder height
3. Lean in, bending elbows
4. Push back to start
5. Repeat 15-20 times

name: Standing Quad Stretch
instructions:
1. Stand on left leg, hold chair for balance
2. Bend right knee, grab ankle behind you
3. Pull heel toward glute
4. Hold 20 seconds
5. Switch legs

name: Arm Circles
instructions:
1. Stand with arms extended to sides
2. Make small circles forward for 20 seconds
3. Reverse direction for 20 seconds
4. Make larger circles forward for 10 seconds
5. Reverse for 10 seconds
benefits: Warms up shoulders, improves range of motion

name: Neck Stretches
instructions:
1. Tilt head to right, hold 10 seconds
2. Tilt to left, hold 10 seconds
3. Look over right shoulder, hold 10 seconds
4. Look over left shoulder, hold 10 seconds
5. Tilt chin to chest, hold 10 seconds
benefits: Relieves tech neck and desk tension

name: Standing Figure-4 Stretch
instructions:
1. Stand facing desk, hands on it for balance
2. Cross right ankle over left knee
3. Sit back slightly into a small squat
4. Hold for 20 seconds
5. Switch sides
benefits: Opens hips, relieves lower back tightness

name: Burpees
instructions:
1. Start standing
2. Drop to plank position
3. Do a push-up
4. Jump feet to hands
5. Jump up with arms overhead
6. Repeat 8-12 times
benefits: Full-body cardio blast, burns calories fast

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions:
1. Start in plank position
2. Drive right knee toward chest
3. Quickly switch, bringing left knee in
4. Continue alternating rapidly for 40 seconds

name: Jump Squats
instructions:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width
2. Squat down
3. Explode up into a jump
4. Land softly and go into next squat
5. Repeat 12-15 times
benefits: Builds explosive power and leg strength

name: Push-ups
instructions:
1. Start in plank position
2. Lower body until chest nearly touches floor
3. Keep elbows at 45 degrees
4. Push back up
5. Repeat 10-20 times

name: Plank Hold
instructions:
1. Start in forearm plank position
2. Keep body in straight line from head to heels
3. Don't let hips sag or pike up
4. Hold for 45-60 seconds
5. Breathe steadily

name: Lunges
instructions:
1. Stand tall
2. Step right foot forward into lunge
3. Lower until both knees at 90 degrees
4. Push back to start
5. Repeat with left leg
6. Do 10 each leg

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions:
1. Start standing, arms at sides
2. Jump feet out, raise arms overhead
3. Jump back to start
4. Continue for 60 seconds at steady pace
benefits: Classic cardio warm-up, gets heart pumping

name: Bicycle Crunches
instructions:
1. Lie on back, hands behind head
2. Lift shoulders and legs off ground
3. Bring right elbow to left knee
4. Switch sides in cycling motion
5. Continue for 40 seconds

name: Glute Bridges
instructions:
1. Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat
2. Lift hips until body forms straight line
3. Squeeze glutes at top
4. Lower back down
5. Repeat 20 times

name: High Knees
instructions:
1. Run in place
2. Drive knees up to hip height
3. Pump arms vigorously
4. Maintain fast pace for 40 seconds

name: Superman Hold
instructions:
1. Lie face down on floor
2. Extend arms forward
3. Lift arms, chest, and legs off ground
4. Hold for 30 seconds
5. Rest and repeat

name: Side Plank
instructions:
1. Lie on right side, prop up on right forearm
2. Stack feet, lift hips off ground
3. Hold for 25 seconds
4. Switch to left side
5. Hold for 25 seconds

name: Inchworms
instructions:
1. Stand, then bend to touch floor
2. Walk hands forward to plank
3. Optional: do a push-up
4. Walk hands back to feet
5. Stand up
6. Repeat 8-10 times

name: Squat Pulses
instructions:
1. Squat down to bottom position
2. Pulse up and down 2 inches
3. Stay low, don't stand all the way up
4. Continue for 40 seconds

name: Dead Bug
instructions:
1. Lie on back, arms straight up
2. Lift legs, knees at 90 degrees
3. Lower right arm and left leg simultaneously
4. Return to start
5. Repeat opposite side
6. Do 12 each side

name: Office Walking Circuit
instructions: Walk around your office floor or building for 3 minutes at a brisk pace. Take the stairs if available.

name: Standing Desk Workout
instructions: 4 minutes: 30s each of standing marches, calf raises, desk push-ups, standing side bends, wall sits, desk dips. Repeat 2x.

name: Stairway Challenge
instructions: 5 minutes: Walk up and down stairs at steady pace. Use railing for support if needed.

name: Chair Yoga Flow
instructions: 4 minutes of gentle chair yoga: seated twists, neck rolls, shoulder stretches, seated cat-cow, ankle circles.

name: Wall Circuit
instructions: 3 rounds: 10 wall push-ups, 20 second wall sit, 15 wall angels. Rest 20 seconds between rounds.

name: Bodyweight Burnout
instructions: 5 rounds: 10 push-ups, 15 squats, 10 lunges, 20 mountain climbers, 30s plank. Rest 30s between rounds.

name: Yoga Flow Sequence
instructions: 5 minutes: Sun salutations, warrior poses, downward dog, child's pose, gentle stretching.

name: HIIT Cardio Session
instructions: 4 minutes: 40s high knees, 20s rest, 40s burpees, 20s rest, 40s jumping jacks, 20s rest. Repeat 2x.

name: Core Power Circuit
instructions: 3 rounds: 20 bicycle crunches, 15 leg raises, 30s plank, 15 Russian twists. Rest 20s between rounds.

name: Lower Body Blast
instructions: 4 rounds: 15 squats, 10 jump squats, 12 lunges each leg, 15 glute bridges. Rest 30s between rounds.

name: Pilates Mat Series
instructions: 5 minutes: The Hundred, roll-ups, single leg circles, double leg stretch, spine stretch forward.

name: Cardio Dance Party
instructions: 4 minutes: Put on your favorite song and dance! Keep moving the entire time.

name: Stretching Routine
instructions: 3 minutes: Full body stretching - hamstrings, quads, hip flexors, shoulders, back, neck. Hold each 20-30s.

name: Upper Body Push/Pull
instructions: 4 rounds: 12 push-ups, 12 pike push-ups, 15 tricep dips (on chair), 20 arm circles. Rest 30s.

name: Mobility Flow
instructions: 5 minutes: Hip circles, leg swings, arm circles, torso rotations, cat-cow, world's greatest stretch.
